docs.abstract: Ed scores US refusal to pressure Mex Govt to halt spraying of marijuana crops with harmful parquat herbicide
docs.lead_paragraph: The Federal Government has finally stumbled on a way to persuade marijuana users that pot is dangerous. It began several years ago with a Federal program aimed at heroin. The United States gave Mexico $40 million to buy aircraft and train personnel to spray killer chemicals on the poppy fields, the source of much of the heroin that enters the United States.
